Description: Manages Azure subscriptions and authentication.
Manages Azure App Configuration stores.
Manages Azure App Service web apps.
Manages Azure Functions (serverless compute).
Manages App Service plans, deployments, and more.
Manages Batch AI resources.
Manages Azure Batch accounts and jobs.
Manages Azure consumption data.
Manages Azure Bot Service bots.
Manages Azure Content Delivery Network profiles and endpoints.
Manages Azure Cognitive Services accounts.
Interacts with Azure Cosmos DB (globally distributed database service).
Manages Data Lake Analytics accounts, jobs, and catalogs.
Manages Data Lake Store accounts and filesystems.
Manages Azure Database Migration Service.
Manages Azure Event Grid topics, domains, and system topics.
Manages Azure Event Hubs namespaces, event hubs, and consumer groups.
Manages HDInsight clusters.
Manages Azure IoT Central applications.
Manages Azure IoT Hub resources.
Interacts with Azure Key Vault (securely stores and manages secrets).
Manages Azure Kubernetes Service clusters.
Manages Azure Logic Apps workflows.
Manages Azure Machine Learning workspaces, experiments, and models.
Manages Azure Maps accounts and services.
Manages Azure Monitor resources.
Manages Azure networking resources (virtual networks, subnets, IP esses, etc.).
Manages Azure Policy Insights.
Manages Azure Resource Graph queries.
Manages Azure resource locks.
Manages Azure RBAC roles and assignments.
Manages Azure Search services.
Manages Azure Service Bus namespaces, queues, and topics.
Manages Azure SQL databases, servers, and elastic pools.
Interacts with Azure Storage accounts (blobs, files, queues, tables).
Manages Azure Synapse Analytics workspaces, pipelines, and datasets.
Creates, manages, and interacts with Azure virtual machines.
Manages Azure App Service web app configurations.
